Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.quizapp.quiz.backend.model.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a single quiz question presented to the user.

Contains the text of the question, possible answers, the correct answer, and metadata linking it to specific games or template types.

Author:
machm
